backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory maps for user profiles, testimonies, scripture content, reflections, feed items, comments, and authorization-protected CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to components, related files, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level descriptions of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles used across the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions setting the app’s color system, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon assets, and the root mounting element for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, query client, layouts, and imports all application pages including evangelism flows and feed-related screens.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Landing/authentication page with a hero image, headline, feature highlights, and login/faith-resources CTAs.
frontend/src/components/evangelism/Evang: Auth-aware CTA card that drives users to sign in, complete onboarding, or navigate to the feed.
Page shell with optional hero image, title, subtitle, and standardized evangelism content layout.
frontend/src/components/feed/AddCommentF: Form for adding comments or prayer requests with reference parsing and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AgentReplyC: Displays an AI agent’s reply with references and timestamp styling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AuthorIdent: Shows author identity, distinguishing between system agent posts and regular user profiles.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Dialog showing a scrollable thread of comments and an embedded form to add new ones.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostC: Composer for creating new feed posts with optional scripture references.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItemCar: Card renderer for scripture, discernment, or testimony feed items with navigation to detail views.
frontend/src/components/feed/FollowButto: Follow/unfollow button with async mutation handling and identity checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/ReactionBar: Reaction control allowing users to like/unlike items with mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/RepostButto: Button to repost an item to the user’s feed with loading state and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/UnifiedFeed: Renders a feed item card with icons, author info, repost detection, timestamps, and follow/reaction/comment controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Implements the top navigation bar with evangelism links, resource links, and authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the global page layout including header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Defines paths for logo and favicon assets along with the brand name.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for user profiles, feeds, reactions, and follow data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvangelismScrollTo: Scrolls to top automatically on evangelism-related routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query hooks for profiles, feeds, posts, reactions, and comments.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, typography, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AssuranceNextStepsPag: Renders assurance and next‑steps discipleship content using evangelism data, with scripture badges and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Displays community‑focused spiritual growth sections with scripture references and links to related evangelism pages.
frontend/src/pages/DailyFeedPage.tsx: Fetches unified and legacy feed data, interleaves daily content, and renders social and daily feed tabs with posting support.
frontend/src/pages/DiscernmentDetailPage: Loads a specific discernment reflection by index and displays its content, labels, and scripture references with navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/evangelism/topics-que: Generic layout component for individual topic pages, rendering sections, references, a back link, framing content, and a CTA.
Loads the 'how-to-read-the-bible' topic and renders it using TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'how-to-share-your-faith' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-happens-after-death' topic and passes it to TopicPageShell.
frontend/src/pages/evangelismContent.ts: Defines structured evangelism content including sections, scripture references, and church-origins framing for pages like Peace With God and Why Jesus.
frontend/src/pages/FaithResourcesPage.ts: Presents categorized links to foundational and growth‑oriented faith resources using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/HowToBeginPage.tsx: Shows step‑by‑step guidance for beginning faith in Christ, including scripture‑backed steps, a sample prayer, and related navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders an onboarding form collecting name, life situation, and spiritual needs, then saves the profile and navigates to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodPage.tsx: Displays gospel-focused teaching sections with references, related topic links, and evangelism content in a structured layout.
frontend/src/pages/peaceWithGodStepsCont: Provides content and scripture references for the 'Steps to Peace with God' framework including step outlines and detailed step data.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsIntr: Introduces a four-step gospel journey with step summaries and a CTA to start the full guide.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsLong: Shows the full detailed four-step gospel explanation with scripture, response steps, and a prayer.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptureDetailPage.t: Shows a detailed view of a selected scripture from the daily feed, including text, reflection, and labels.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitTestimonyPage.t: Provides a form to submit a testimony with scripture references and shows a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/topicsQuestionsConten: Defines the TopicContent interface and provides structured theological content for topics and questions used in the frontend.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsQuestionsIndexP: Renders the index of topics and questions with links generated from slugs and styled cards inside an evangelism page layout.
frontend/src/pages/WhyJesusPage.tsx: Displays the 'Why Jesus?' evangelism content with section cards, scripture badges, navigation links, and a CTA within an evangelism page shell.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, image requirements, requested additions, and overall project state.
